name: Entity
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Entity
description:
Entity

Represents characteristics of an entity detected in an image. May describe a real-world entity such as a person, place, or thing. May be identified with an entity ID as an entity in the Knowledge Graph (KG).

examples.caption: In landmark detection:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/vision"

vision = Google::Cloud::Vision.new

image = vision.image "path/to/landmark.jpg"

landmark = image.landmark
landmark.score #=> 0.9191226363182068
landmark.description #=> "Mount Rushmore"
landmark.mid #=> "/m/019dvv"

examples.caption: In logo detection:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/vision"

vision = Google::Cloud::Vision.new

image = vision.image "path/to/logo.jpg"

logo = image.logo
logo.score #=> 0.7005731463432312
logo.description #=> "Google"
logo.mid #=> "/m/0b34hf"

examples.caption: In label detection:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/vision"

vision = Google::Cloud::Vision.new

image = vision.image "path/to/landmark.jpg"

labels = image.labels
labels.count #=> 4

label = labels.first
label.score #=> 0.9481348991394043
label.description #=> "stone carving"
label.mid #=> "/m/02wtjj"

methods.name: mid
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Entity#mid
methods.description: Opaque entity ID. Some IDs might be available in Knowledge Graph (KG).

methods.name: locale
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Entity#locale
methods.description: The language code for the locale in which the description is expressed.

methods.name: description
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Entity#description
methods.description: Entity textual description, expressed in the #locale language.

methods.name: confidence
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Entity#confidence
methods.description: The accuracy of the entity detection in an image. For example, for an image containing ‘Eiffel Tower,’ this field represents the confidence that there is a tower in the query image.

methods.name: topicality
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Entity#topicality
methods.description: The relevancy of the ICA (Image Content Annotation) label to the image. For example, the relevancy of ‘tower’ to an image containing ‘Eiffel Tower’ is likely higher than an image containing a distant towering building, though the confidence that there is a tower may be the same.

methods.name: bounds
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Entity#bounds
methods.description: Image region to which this entity belongs. Not filled currently for labels detection.

methods.name: locations
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Entity#locations
methods.description: The location information for the detected entity. Multiple Location elements can be present since one location may indicate the location of the scene in the query image, and another the location of the place where the query image was taken. Location information is usually present for landmarks.

returns.description:
An array of locations containing latitude
and longitude.

methods.name: properties
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Entity#properties
methods.description: Some entities can have additional optional Property fields. For example a different kind of score or string that qualifies the entity. present for landmarks.

returns.description: A hash containing property names and values.

methods.name: to_h
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Entity#to_h
methods.description: Deeply converts object to a hash. All keys will be symbolized.
